hints.content:
The first clock reads $\redD7{:}\blueD{23}$.



[[☃ image 1]]



[[☃ image 2]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute. The short, red hand points between the 7 and the 8. The blue, long hand points to the third tick mark after the 4. !
A number line labeled 7:20 to 8:20 with tick marks at every minute unit. Beneath the number line, the 20-minute tick marks are labeled. The 7:23 tick mark is highlighted and labeled. !

hints.content:
Now, let's find $55$ minutes after $\redD7{:}\blueD{23}$.



[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{\redD7{:}\blueD{23}} +{} &\goldE{7}\text{ minutes} = 7{:}30\\\\
7{:}30 +{} & \tealD{30}\text{ minutes} = 8{:}00 \\\\
8{:}00 +{} & \purpleD{10}\text{ minutes} = 8{:}10 \\\\
8{:}10 +{}&\greenD{8}\text{ minutes} = {\redD8{:}\blueD{18}}
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 7:20 to 8:20 with tick marks every 1 minute unit. A series of four arrows are shown moving left to right from the 7:23 tick mark to the 8:18 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 7:23  tick mark and ends at the 7:30 tick mark and is labeled plus 7. The second arrow starts at the 7:30 tick mark and ends at the 8:00 tick mark and is labeled plus 30. The third arrow starts at the 8:00 tick mark and ends at the 8:10 tick mark and is labeled plus 10. The fourth arrow starts at the 8:10 tick mark and ends at the 8:18 tick mark and is labeled plus 8. !

hints.content:
$\redD8{:}\blueD{18}$ is $55$ minutes after $\redD7{:}\blueD{23}$.

[[☃ image 1]]

Which clock shows $\redD8{:}\blueD{18}$?

options.alt: A number line labeled 7:20 to 8:20 with tick marks at every minute unit. Beneath the number line, the twenty-minute tick marks are labeled. The 7:23 and 8:18 tick marks are highlighted and labeled. !
A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute. The short hand points between the 8 and the 9. The long hand points to the third tick mark after the 3. !

question.content:
Look at the time on the following clock.



[[☃ image 1]]

**Which clock shows a time that is $55$ minutes later?**    

[[☃ radio 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute.  The short hand points between the 7 and the 8. The long hand points to the third tick mark after the 4. !
